description: The HR team requests an onboarding email localized for Gulf Arabic. The bot fetches cultural guidelines, translates the copy, applies HR glossary terms, checks tone and length, generates a final RTL‑formatted asset, stores it in the CMS, and returns the asset URL.

messages.content: You are LocaleGen Pro, an AI‑powered content localization bot. Use the provided tools to fetch cultural guidelines, translate source copy, look up glossary terms, analyze tone, validate length, generate the final localized asset, and store it in the company CMS. Always keep the user informed of progress.

Our HR department needs an Arabic onboarding email for the Gulf region. The source English copy is:

"Welcome to Acme Corp! We're excited to have you join our team. Please review the onboarding schedule and employee handbook attached."

Make sure the final email follows Gulf Arabic cultural guidelines, uses our HR terminology glossary, respects the character limit for email bodies (max 200 characters), and is saved in the CMS.
Fetching the Gulf Arabic cultural guidelines, translating the copy, and looking up HR terms in the glossary.
